articles.author: Isaac Schultz
articles.title: See the ExoMars Parachute Deploy From 18 Miles Up - Gizmodo
articles.description: The European Space Agency tested the vital component of the upcoming Mars mission last week.
articles.content: A dummy ascended to stratospheric heights last week, as part of the European Space Agencys ongoing preparation for its ExoMars mission, set to launch next year. The structural integrity (and reputati… [+1577 chars]

articles.title: Euro 2020: Spain through to semifinals after beating Switzerland on penalties - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Unai Simon made two saves and Mikel Oyarzabal scored the decisive penalty to give Spain a spot in the European Championship semifinals.
articles.content:
As Spains jubilant players sprinted onto the field to celebrate a penalty shootout victory at the European Championship, Luis Enrique stood alone and simply pumped his fists.
 Amid the tension and r… [+4499 chars]

articles.title: Spain in semis after penalties win v Switzerland - SuperSport
articles.description: Spain's Mikel Oyarzabal struck the winning penalty after Switzerland's Ruben Vargas fired over the bar as Spain won 3-1 in a shootout following a 1-1 draw in their European Championship quarterfinal

articles.author: Cara Anna
articles.title: Africa's COVID-19 envoy blasts EU, COVAX over vaccine crisis - La Crosse Tribune
